# Your Business Growth, Done Right.
Technology that works to grow your business' online presence so you can focus on what you do best.
[Get started](https://plutis.io/<https:/platform.marketleap.io>)
![Small Business Owner 2](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fowners%2Fowner_2.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Small Business Owner 3](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fowners%2Fowner_3.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Small Business Owner 4](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fowners%2Fowner_4.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![Small Business Owner 5](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fowners%2Fowner_5.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![Small Business Owner 6](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fowners%2Fowner_6.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![Small Business Owner 7](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fowners%2Fowner_7.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## Supercharge Your Business Growth
### AI-Powered Automation
Our advanced AI handles your marketing tasks, freeing up your time for strategic decisions.
### Multi-Channel Management
Manage all your marketing channels from a single, intuitive dashboard.
### Data-Driven Insights
Make informed decisions with real-time analytics and actionable insights.
## How Market Leap Works
Our platform simplifies your marketing efforts in three easy steps
### Connect
Integrate all your marketing channels with our platform
### Automate
Let our AI optimize your marketing strategies
### Grow
Watch your business thrive with data-driven insights
## Proven Results
300%
Increase in Lead Generation
50%
Reduction in Customer Acquisition Costs
200%
Boost in Social Media Engagement
4x
Improvement in Marketing ROI
## Tailored Solutions for Every Business
Choose the plan that fits your needs and scale as you grow
### Basic
Get started with comprehensive audits of your digital presence.
$0/mo
[Learn More](https://plutis.io/</pricing>)
Most Popular
### Growth
Get the benefit of a full-service SEO or paid ads agency / team.
$350/mo
[Learn More](https://plutis.io/</pricing>)
### Scale
Get the benefit of a full-service marketing team that works 24/7 to grow your business across every channel.
$600/mo
[Learn More](https://plutis.io/</pricing>)
## Ready to Transform Your Business?
Join thousands of businesses using Market Leap to automate their growth. Get 50% off your first month.
[See Pricing](https://plutis.io/</pricing>)
![Market Leap Logo](https://plutis.io/_next/image?url=%2Fmarketleap_white.png&w=384&q=75)
[+1 (650) 427-9324](https://plutis.io/<tel:+16504279324>)[Get Started](https://plutis.io/<https:/platform.marketleap.io>)
### Plans
  * [Basic](https://plutis.io/</products/basic>)
  * [Growth](https://plutis.io/</products/growth>)
  * [Scale](https://plutis.io/</products/scale>)


### Features
  * [Social Media](https://plutis.io/</features/social-media>)
  * [Text Marketing](https://plutis.io/</features/text-marketing>)
  * [Email Marketing](https://plutis.io/</features/email-marketing>)
  * [SEO](https://plutis.io/</features/seo>)
  * [Paid Ads](https://plutis.io/</features/paid-ads>)
  * [Business Listing Management](https://plutis.io/</features/business-listing>)
  * [Website Management](https://plutis.io/</features/website-management>)


### Resources
  * [Solutions](https://plutis.io/</solutions>)


### Legal
  * [Privacy Policy](https://plutis.io/</privacy-policy>)
  * [Terms of Service](https://plutis.io/</terms>)


© 2024 Plutis Inc. Empowering businesses to thrive and innovate.

generated_description:
**Plutis: Simplifying Business Growth with AI**

Founded in 2022, Plutis is a fresh face in the tech landscape, based in San Francisco and currently rolling out its innovations as part of Y Combinator's W23 batch. With a small but mighty team of two and under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel, Plutis is all about transforming how businesses engage with their online markets.

At its core, Plutis offers an AI-powered platform called Market Leap, designed to streamline the marketing process for small businesses. The idea is straightforward: let their technology take care of the tedious marketing tasks, allowing entrepreneurs to focus on higher-level strategy. Whether it’s through social media management, email marketing, or SEO, Plutis encompasses a range of features aimed at enhancing online presence.

Here’s a quick look at what they provide:

1. **AI-Powered Automation**: Their advanced AI manages marketing efforts, so users can dedicate their time to strategic choices rather than daily tasks.
   
2. **Multi-Channel Management**: All marketing channels can be controlled from one user-friendly dashboard—no more juggling multiple tools.

3. **Data-Driven Insights**: Real-time analytics ensure businesses make informed decisions and adapt their strategies on the fly.

For businesses seeking growth, Plutis offers tiered subscription plans:
- **Basic**: Free access to comprehensive digital audits.
- **Growth**: Full-service SEO and ads for $350/month, ideal for businesses wanting more visibility.
- **Scale**: A robust 24/7 marketing team at $600/month, focusing on scaling operations across all channels.

Proven results back their services, with claims of up to a 300% increase in lead generation and a 50% reduction in customer acquisition costs. 

Ready to give your business a boost? Plutis is inviting everyone to "Get Started" and is currently offering 50% off your first month. 

Check them out at [Plutis.io](https://plutis.io) for more details on how they’re making business growth straightforward and effective.
